item.title: Networking Nuggets – Hub vs Bridge vs Switch
item.description: Here is an overview of three basic networking devices – Hub, Bridge and a Switch. This blog and the related YouTube video will be useful for upcoming topics related to virtual networking such as Linux Bridge and Open vSwitch.
